titles.title: A bill to remove fish and wildlife as an authorized purpose of the Missouri River Mainstem Reservoir System and to make flood control the highest priority of authorized purposes of the System, and for other purposes.
Missouri River Flood Control Prioritization Act
Missouri River Flood Control Prioritization Act
Missouri River Flood Control Prioritization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Missouri River Flood Control Prioritization Act
This bill addresses the management of the Missouri River Mainstem Reservoir System. Specifically, it designates flood control as the highest priority of the system. The system may not be managed for the protection of fish and wildlife.
